definitions.body: :Je 4:5 breaking, fracture, crushing, breach, crash;—abs. [[שֶׁבֶר]] Is 51:19 +, [[שָָׁבֶר]] La 3:47, Pr 17:19, cstr. [[שֶׁבֶר]] Is 1:28 +, [[שֵׁבֶר ]] Am 6:6 +; sf. [[שִׁבְרִי]] Je 10:19, etc.; pl. [[שְׁבָרִים]] Jos 7:5, Job 41:17 (dub., v. infr.), sf. [[שְׁבָרֶיהָ]] Ps 60:4;—

breaking of pottery Is 30:14, fracture of member, limb Le 21:19, Le 24:20 (H), esp. fig. of people personif. [[יוֹסֵף]] ´[[שׁ]]: Am 6:6, cf. Is 30:26 (‖[[מַחַץ מַכָּתוֹ ]]), Je 8:21, Je 10:19, Je 14:17, Je 30:12 (‖[[מַכָּה ]]), v:Je 30:15 (‖[[מַכְאׂב ]]), La 2:11, La 3:48, La 4:10, also (c. [[רפא]], [[רפה]] heal) Je 6:14, Je 8:11, La 2:13, Ps 60:4, cf. Na 3:19; of sinners Is 1:28; shattering, crushing, of wall (in fig.) Is 30:13; ‖[[גׇּדוֹל]] ´[[שׁ]] :([[רָעָה ]]) Je 4:6, Je 6:1, ´[[עַל־שׁ]]:´[[שׁ]]: Je 4:20; ´[[שׁׂד וׇשׁ]]: Is 59:7, Is 60:18, Je 48:3, cf. Is 51:19; ´[[הַשֵּׁאת וְהַשּׁ]]: La 3:47; ´[[זַעֲקַת שׁ]]: Is 15:5, cf. Je 48:5; of individ. Pr 16:18, Pr 17:19, Pr 18:12; fig., [[רוּחַ]] ´[[שׁ]]: crushing of spirit, cf. Pr 15:4; so ([[רוּחַ]] om.) [[מִשְּׁבָרִים]] Job 41:17 from terror, Di De, cf. Bi, but dub.; Buhl Bu conj. [[מִשְׁבְּרֵי יׇם]], Gie [[מִשִּׁנׇּיו גִּבּׂרִים]], Du [[מִשְׁמָרִים]].
breaking of a dream, i.e. its interpretation (solution of mystery) Ju Jdg 7:15 (cf. GFM).

[[הַשְּׁבָרִים]] Jos 7:5, perhaps (Di Benn Steuern) the quarries as n.pr.loc., Vulgate Sabarim (> LXX SyrVer Targum [[הִשָּֽׁבְרָם]]).—[[שִׁבְרִי]] Ez Eze 32:9, read [[שִׁבְיְךָ]] LXX Co Sta Berthol Krae (not Toy).
